wyapruthiye sankalpamaya agayakama saha ehi wadagathkama pilibandawa madhyayan saha mahajanathawa danuwath kirimath, wyapruthiya pilibandawath ehi adhika piriwaya saha parisarika balapama pilibandawath pathira athi srunathmaka aakalpayan niwaradi karamin owun siyallanma wyapruthiya kerehi sahaya labagena sthawarayak wetha gasimata menma aadhara sapayum aayathana niyojithayan samaga niranthara raswim pawathwamin itha shura lesa sanniwedana karyayaka niratha wuyeya.
